prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Piano, Guitar, Pipe, Bass, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Piano, Guitar, Pipe, Bass - but no Organ.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Piano, Guitar, Pipe, Bass - Organ excluded.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Drums, Piano, Guitar, Pipe, Bass - Organ not included.
